bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
'[{title:"全部漫画",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=0&complete=1&page={{page}}&orderby=1",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.4}},{title:"最新上架",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=1&complete=1&page={{page}}&orderby=3",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.4}},{title:"韩漫",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=2&complete=1&page={{page}}&orderby=1",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.25}},{title:"完结",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=2&complete=2&page={{page}}&orderby=1",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.25}},{title:"连载",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=2&complete=3&page={{page}}&orderby=1",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.25}},{title:"更新",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=2&complete=1&page={{page}}&orderby=2",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.4}},{title:"上架",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=2&complete=1&page={{page}}&orderby=3",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.4}},{title:"日漫",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=3&complete=1&page={{page}}&orderby=1",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.25}},{title:"完结",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=3&complete=2&page={{page}}&orderby=1",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.25}},{title:"连载",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=3&complete=3&page={{page}}&orderby=1",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.25}},{title:"更新",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=3&complete=1&page={{page}}&orderby=2",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.4}},{title:"上架",url:"' + host + '/manga/library?type=3&complete=1&page={{page}}&orderby=3",style:{layout_flexGrow:1,layout_flexBasisPercent:0.4}}]';
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/55.0.2883.87 UBrowser/6.2.4094.1 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[

  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },

  { name: "   简繁转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },
  
 { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "          ①开心看❶         ", type: "button", action: "$(1)"},

    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

ruleBookInfo.init:

'〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + num[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 25 ? Get('url').substring(0, 25) + "
" + Get('url').substring(25) : Get('url')) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑简繁转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': $2('.anime__details__title h3'), 'author': $2('.anime__details__title span').replace(/[,&|]|[图文][:：]/g, '/').replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, '/').replace(/^[\/]/g, '').replace(/\|\//g, '').replace(/\s\/\s/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+|(\s+)(?=\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/'), 'kind': s + ',' + k, 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + $2('.anime__details__text p').replace(/(^)/g, '$1
') + changeLog, 'cover': $3('.anime__details__pic') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'] }); } Put(book);

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.product__item');
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].select('h6 a').text(),
            'author': '',
            'kind': '♥ ' + list[i].select('.view').text() + ',' + list[i].select('.ep').text() + list[i].select('.epgreen').text(),
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].select('div').attr('data-setbg') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
            'url': list[i].select('h6 a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.product__item')[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({

        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    option = '{\n    "charset":"UTF-8",\n    "headers":{\n      "Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/manga/library",\n      "Cookie":""\n    }\n  }';
    return Get('url') + '/manga/search?keyword=' + e + ',' + option;
}(key));
</js>
